data.text: A Nzambi, kadi ba dio sui !
Tala, phila bambeni ziaku zilembo tudila divunzi ;
Mu diela dimbimbi, balembo yendila batu baku manenga ;
Batuba : “yizanu, bika tuba bunga banga dikanda,
Mu mabanza mamosi, bakutakana mu fiela,
Zinzo zi ngoto zi Edoni ayi zi basi Isimayeli,
ka diambu ko Asili mamvawu bafubakana yawu,
Wuba vangila banga bu wuvangila Madiani,
Wuba kitula banga kinzungidila ; A Nzambi ama,
Buna wuba kukila mu vuka kiaku ki phemo ;
Bika bafua tsoni ayi bamona tsisi mu zithangu zioso ;
Bika wuba zabikisa ti ngeyo vuidi dizina di Yave ;
